title: Dune Crest
description:
Featuring a private pool and mountain views, Dune Crest is set in Cape Town. Located 700 m from Muizenberg Beach, the property provides an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a fridge, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a stovetop. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.


A barbecue is available for guests to use at the apartment.


Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden is 18 km from Dune Crest, while Chapman's Peak is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Cape Town International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.
address: 73 Dune Crest Complex Sunrise Boulevard Muizenberg, 7945 Cape Town, South Africa
